DJST waste segregation in sack store: metal and wood bins are not available in sack store we could have a dedicated temporary bin before putting in skips below. One of the spill kits is sealed
rule: the other one is not sealed. One water bottle is stored behind the unit waiting to be segregated. In front of the unit there is a wooden basket with cardboxes and empty liquid retarder blue bottles waiting to be segregated as well. Improper waste segregation: wood in contaminated bin
column3: AT42 transmission oil bottle in plastic bin should have been placed in contaminated. Access to waste bins could be easier but big white contenants in front are blocking the access. Fire hoses and extinguishers have been inspected for July.
